resource.description: The ``AWS::ApiGatewayV2::Model`` resource updates data model for a WebSocket API. For more information, see [Model Selection Expressions](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/apigateway-websocket-api-selection-expressions.html#apigateway-websocket-api-model-selection-expressions) in the *API Gateway Developer Guide*.

properties.name: ContentType
properties.description: The content-type for the model, for example, "application/json".

type.description: The content-type for the model, for example, "application/json".

properties.name: Schema
properties.description: The schema for the model. For application/json models, this should be JSON schema draft 4 model.

type.description: The schema for the model. For application/json models, this should be JSON schema draft 4 model.

attributes.description: The ``AWS::ApiGatewayV2::Model`` resource updates data model for a WebSocket API. For more information, see [Model Selection Expressions](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/apigateway-websocket-api-selection-expressions.html#apigateway-websocket-api-model-selection-expressions) in the *API Gateway Developer Guide*.
